product_desc:
THE AUTOMATION CONTROLS ACE INDUSTRIAL ETHERNET CONVERTER IS A STATE-OF-THE-ART GATEWAY INTERFACING THE MOST POPULAR INDUSTRIAL ETHERNET PROTOCOLS INCLUDING TO ETHERNET/IP, PROFINET, AND MODBUS TCP/IP TO MODBUS AND DF1 DEVICES.

The 1784-U2DHP USB-to-Data Highway Plus Cable lets you connect a computer to a Data Highway Plus (DH+) network via an unused USB port on the computer. You can also use the cable to connect the computer to PLC-5 processors (except for Classic PLC-5 processors, such as PLC-5/10, PLC-5/12, PLC-5/15, and PLC-5/25) or SLC 5/04 processors.
high_concept: data highway plus, DH+, PLC, USB, converter, Ethernet/ip, Df1
name: Automation Control
